mapper.select: select p.pno, p.titl, p.pric, p.content, p.sdt, p.edt, p.tno, p.type, t.comaddr, p.lat, p.lng, (((6371*acos(cos(radians(37.494533687556945))*cos(radians(p.lat))*cos(radians(p.lng) -radians(127.02810003919578))+sin(radians(37.494533687556945))*sin(radians(p.lat)))))*1000) AS meter from promotion p inner join tcher t on p.tno = t.tno having meter < 3000 ORDER BY meter LIMIT 0,3000

SELECT p.titl, t.tno, m.name, t.comaddr, p.content, p.lng, p.lat, p.type, t.introduction, (((6371*acos(cos(radians(37.494533687556945))*cos(radians(p.lat))*cos(radians(p.lng) -radians(127.02810003919578))+sin(radians(37.494533687556945))*sin(radians(p.lat)))))*1000) AS meter FROM memb m left join tcher t on t.tno = m.mno left join promotion p on p.tno = t.tno GROUP BY m.id having meter < 3000 ORDER BY meter LIMIT 0,3000

SELECT p.titl, t.tno, m.name, t.comaddr, p.content, p.lng, p.lat, p.type, t.introduction, (((6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(p.lat))*cos(radians(p.lng) -radians(#{lon}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(p.lat)))))*1000) AS meter FROM memb m left join tcher t on t.tno = m.mno left join promotion p on p.tno = t.tno GROUP BY m.id having meter < 3000 ORDER BY meter LIMIT 0,3000
